meanings.definition: Not joined or connected by solder.
meanings.sent1: The unsoldered wires kept coming apart.
meanings.sent2: The circuit board had unsoldered connections that needed fixing.
meanings.sent3: The robot's unsoldered arm fell off during the dance routine.
meanings.sent4: Her unsoldered friendship with him slowly faded away.
meanings.sent5: The unsoldered bridge collapsed under the weight of the cars.

meanings.definition: Not secured or fixed with solder.
meanings.sent1: The unsoldered components were causing the device to malfunction.
meanings.sent2: He realized the unsoldered joint was the reason for the leak.
meanings.sent3: The unsoldered button kept falling off his shirt.
meanings.sent4: Their unsoldered promises were easily broken.
meanings.sent5: The unsoldered lock failed to keep the door shut.
